description:
iOS 9, Swift 2 App Development with Xcode 7 For Beginners.

This course is for those with no experience. You will learn where to "start" building apps. It will teach you how to turn your ideas into iPhone apps in no time!

You will learn the basics of Swift as well as the major user interface components of Xcode. Along the way you will be challenged with activities using what you have learned. This course provides you with the proper technique and material for retention and a long lasting skill.
title: iOS 9, Swift 2 App Development with Xcode 7 For Beginners
